main event: A civilian observer in Greenville, Maine reported seeing an unidentified flying object in the sky on August 10, 1962.
interesting points: The object was described as having a yellowish-white light and moving at very high speeds., The object appeared to be smaller than a baseball at arm's length., The observer noted that the object stopped or slowed down, but he did not witness its disappearance., The observation lasted for about 30 seconds, during which it moved from the southern sky to directly overhead., Subsequent investigations suggested it was likely related to military exercises in the area during that time.
sighted object: unidentified flying object with yellowish-white light
witness description: civilian observer with past experience as a civilian pilot
